channel.title: Homepage on CloudOps
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on CloudOps

item.title: About Us
item.description: Meet CloudOps CloudOps is a cloud consulting, managed services, and software company focused on open source, cloud native platforms, networking and DevOps History Launched in 2005 by Ian Rae to meet the infrastructure needs of software-focused organizations, CloudOps has grown steadily and organically from an operations managed services shop to a leader in cloud computing, cloud networking, and DevOps solutions. The services we provide help customers use and build cloud platforms, with an emphasis on operational success and networking connectivity.

item.title: Docker and Kubernetes Workshop
item.description: Back Next Workshop Docker and Kubernetes CloudOps is a cloud consulting, managed services, and software company focused on open source, cloud native platforms, networking and DevOps CloudOps’ flagship workshop covers architecture principles of microservices, then gets in to the mechanics of container tooling – now a key model for application development. Our workshops are Linux-based. If you are interested in Docker and Kubernetes training on Windows, please let us know here.

item.title: Experts
item.description: Our Experts Our team works tirelessly to build, maintain, and deliver up-to-date, practical content on a variety of subjects and tools. Our experts Michael Foster Cloud Solution Architect Michael specializes in cloud native technologies, including Docker and Kubernetes, as well as CI/CD and monitoring tools. He is a Certified Kubernetes Administrator, and has worked on data pipelines and process optimization for organizations ranging from research centres to international banks.

item.title: Partners
item.description: Get up to speed with CloudOps workshops Our training provides technical know-how and business value on DevOps in day - not months. DevOps Workshops Using the Cloud Guidance in selecting the ideal cloud platforms and tools for your application, building a DevOps toolchain, and operating it 24/7. Cloud Building Become a cloud resource provider for internal teams or external customers.

item.title: Solutions
item.description: Cloud Services and Products CloudOps is a cloud consulting, managed services, and software company focused on open source, cloud native platforms, networking and DevOps We partner with our customers to meet business, cultural, and technical requirements. CloudOps prides itself on being platform and tool agnostic but opinionated when building, operating, and equipping teams to support successful cloud strategies. This allows our customers to own their destiny with a mix of open source software, partner, DevOps tools, and our own automation workflows.

item.title: Using cloud
item.description: Using Cloud Our team works tirelessly to build, maintain, and deliver up-to-date, practical content on a variety of subjects and tools. Our team finds the best ways to help and support your business, cultural, and technical objectives. Along the way, we equip you with all the knowledge you need to control your technology stack. CloudOps builds, operates, and can fully transfer and support the solutions it builds, allowing you to own your destiny in the cloud™ and fuel your innovation.

item.title: Workshops
